title: Where is One For All??? :c
body: Where has One For All been all these times, inbetween multiple ascensions and ascensions and now Invasion, it feels like a long time since I have seen One For All, some goes for Legend Of the Poro King. But especially One For All, as for me and all my friends (and I'm sure plenty of others) love this gamemode yet we havn't been able to play it. Is it coming back or is it a dead gamemode? {{champion:201}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: IT WILL BE BACK DONT WORRY MY BOI
